prefercite.p: Addition to the papers of Hardy Cross Dillard, 1943-1944, MSS 84-8c, Box Number, Special Collections, University of Virginia Law Library.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: This addition to the papers of Hardy Cross Dillard was transferred to the Law Library when the box was discovered in the Dean's Office prior to a 1988 renovation.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The papers concerned Dillard's work as diretor of training with the Civil Affairs Division of the First Army in England preparing for the aftermath of the invasion of France.
